title: (x) Rough cut sans display font - Brady Bunch Remastered {Lex}
content:
Can't find anything in my collection like this. Please help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [flier-font-sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101003072550/http:/typophile.com/files/flier-font-sample.jpg) | 58.02 KB |
author: payback99

comments.content:
It's quite similar to Chank's [Eatwell Chubby](http://web.archive.org/web/20101003072550/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/eatwell/), but not identical.

- Mike Yanega

I'm pretty sure this is a freeware font - I had it on my old machine. I can't remember the name though.

- Lex

Now I remember - It's [Brady Bunch Remastered](http://web.archive.org/web/20101003072550/http:/dafont.com/en/font.php?file=brady_bunch&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=Technology+Grants+Available+On&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha), stretched.

- Lex

P.S. It looks like they used the capital 'G' to replace the lower 'g'. Either that or the non-remastered version might have had a different 'g'.

- Lex
Thanks all very much. I'm sure it's the Brady Bunch because of the upper case B and D in the lower case letter.
